entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Mont-Laurier
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:49 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.3°C
entry.summary:

Humidity: 95 %

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow early this evening. Local blowing snow this evening and overnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending early in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
